qas.question: When was Abulfaz Elchibey elected to Chairman of the Popular Front?
How many protesters filled Lenin Square on August 19th?

context: On <a0_0>July 16, 1989<a0_0/>, the Popular Front of Azerbaijan held its first congress and elected Abulfaz Elchibey, who would become President, as its Chairman. On August 19, <a1_0>600,000<a1_0/> protesters jammed Baku’s Lenin Square (now Azadliq Square) to demand the <a2_0>release of political prisoners<a2_0/>. In the second half of 1989, weapons were handed out in Nagorno-Karabakh. When Karabakhis got hold of small arms to replace hunting rifles and crossbows, casualties began to mount; bridges were blown up, roads were blockaded, and hostages were taken.
